text: (bright music)

- I'm Romy, I'm a Partner
Solution Architect at AWS.
As a Partner Solution Architect,

I work with AWS Partners
to build their practices,

both from a technical and
a business perspective.
So in terms of skills
that you need for a solution architect,

I feel like it's already
a bit in the word, right?
We build solutions.
So for me, it's all about problem solving.
Every day is a new day.
You'd never know what's gonna coming.

I'm really proud of the
moment where I had a project
that I felt was needed in the company.

I wrote up this narrative,
these documents,

and it's got sent up
the chain to leadership,

then it's now an actual
tool that we use internally.

So that's a really cool thing
to have done as a graduate
in early stage career.
But you get so many opportunities
and adventures in this company.
I get a lot of space to try new things
that I find interesting

and to focus on where
I can develop the most.
I'm quite passionate about sustainability,
and I feel like technology

can really help move the
needle in that space.
So I got the freedom to run an initiative,

to find partner companies
to create flywheels,
in which we can work together
to achieve that with the cloud.
So I'm really excited about that.
